title: When was the first Sunset Park School built?  I think it was in the 1900\'s.  Was the Lucille Schuffler building which now houses Opera House  the second building. When was the current building built and the students moved in?  Check the December 10, 1939  Wilmington Star.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=7757 Sorry, we weren't able to find the location of the original Susnet Park school. But
